description:
HAEIT SYMBOLS #02 - HOPE

The second piece of the series.

It represents hope. Simple as that.
As a kid born and raised in a culturally chaotic country like Brazil, we've learned how to keep fighting for existence with art.

Inspired by the graphic style of great artists of our culture like Oscar Niemeyer, Athos Bulcao, Alexandre Wollner and some others around the world like OTL Aicher, this piece wants to tell a history about our unknown and incertain future.
